alert.note: Alert for Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 12:21PM CST until February 05 at 5:17AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Tennessee... Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. For the Pigeon River...including Newport TN...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pigeon River at Newport TN. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway 25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and then remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.3 feet on 10/24/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM EST.
